channel.title: [317] when i run client i get "The system cannot find the path specified" LOOK
channel.description: i run the client and i get this, [code]The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] i edit run.bat and this is code [code]@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code]

item.title: [317] when i run client i get "The system cannot find the path specified" LOOK
item.dc:creator: @lpxd lpxd
item.description:
@lpxd wrote:

When that happens to me (the jframe error)
i just do like

cd c:\Client

instead of the .\class thing or w.e
Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] when i run client i get "The system cannot find the path specified" LOOK
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Sounds like a control panel fail?
Jframe i think is control panel,i suggest taking it out.

item.source: [317] when i run client i get "The system cannot find the path specified" LOOK

item.title: [317] when i run client i get "The system cannot find the path specified" LOOK
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

when i do that i get this error

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: [317] when i run client i get "The system cannot find the path specified" LOOK

item.title: [317] when i run client i get "The system cannot find the path specified" LOOK
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

try:

@echo off title Client -cd .\Class\ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
Also if you don’ t have a 64 bit OS, then just take out the “(x86)” in the path and leave it as:

@echo off title Client -cd .\Class\ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Read full topic
